intro: ^Rashad?Smiling "Hey there adventurer! What's your quest today?"

s: ^Ha, I've gotta go dig up some ancient tomes on career fairs from the back of the library.
^You wouldn't happen to know anything about career fairs, would you?

R1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Career fairs, huh? Now that takes me back. What are you learning about career fairs for? Block party planning got you down?"

s: ^No, no, I'm doing research to help my friend Elisa. She's a college student.
^Yes, career fairs are the topic to turn to if I'm down and out from planning... It's for a friend of mine.

R2: ^Rashad?Smiling "Oh, sure! I went to quite a few career fairs when I was in college. We sometimes use them to recruit future librarians, too. What seems to be the problem?"

s: ^My friend Elisa needs some advice- should she prepare anything for the career fair?

R3: ^Rashad?Smiling "Ah, a college student! Well, maybe I can help. What seems to be the problem?"

s: ^Well, she's never been to a career fair before and she needs some advice. What should she prepare before the event?

elevatorPitch: ^Rashad?Smiling "She'll probably want to practice an elevator pitch for when she goes up to people. It should be short and to the point."
^Rashad?Smiling "The major points to hit would be a personal introduction, what her career goals are, what her experience is, and what she would bring to the company."

s: ^Elevator pitch, got it. What do you think should she bring to the career fair?

R4: ^Rashad?Smiling "A friend of yours! Well, any friend of
^ is a friend of mine! What seems to be the problem?"

s: ^Well, she's never been to a career fair before and she needs some advice. What should she prepare before the event?

RBringItems: ^Rashad_Day 1_Bring copies of your resume to a career fair_Elisa1

RBringItems.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Bring copies of your resume to a career fair_Elisa1
notification Rashad_Day 1_Recruiters might pass off your resume

RBringItems: ^Rashad?Smiling "Ah, well tell her to bring some copies of her resume to hand off to the recruiters."
^Rashad?Smiling "If they aren't interested in you for the position they are looking for, the recruiter might pass it onto other people in the company that are hiring."
^Rashad?Smiling "She'll probably want to bring a few different ones, too, if she knows what kinds of jobs she's looking for. A targeted resume can help you stand out to recruiters more."

s: ^What's a targeted resume?
^Makes sense. Is there anything else she should bring besides her resumes?

targetedResume: ^Rashad?Smiling "It's just like a normal resume, only it narrows down your work experience and education to what's specifically relevant for the role you're applying to."
^Rashad?Smiling "That way, it's easier for the recruiters to see at a glance that you'd be a good fit."

s: ^Got it. Is there anything else she should bring?

RBringNotes.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Bring a pen to take notes_Elisa1

RBringNotes: ^Rashad?Neutral "Hmmm... that's the big one. Maybe tell her to bring a pen and a notepad so she can write down people's information."

s: ^Got it! Do you have any tips for good conversation?

RConvoTips: ^Rashad_Day 1_Be sure to prepare questions to ask the recruiters_Elisa1

RConvoTips.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Be sure to prepare questions to ask the recruiters_Elisa1

RConvoTips: ^Rashad?Smiling "Sure! The conversation doesn't have to only be about marketing yourself. Your friend should try to make a good connection."
^Rashad?Smiling "So, you can turn the tables on the recruiter- ask them what drew them to the company, what it's like to work there, stuff like that!"

s: ^Awesome! One last question, do you have any general tips for success?

RGeneralTips: ^Rashad?Neutral "Be sure to follow up afterwards. You can contact most recruiters online- do you know if she's good with computers?"

s: ^Not really, no.
^She seems to be pretty decent!

Rtech1: ^Rashad_Day 1_Linkedin and email are great places to follow up_Elisa1

Rtech1.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Linkedin and email are great places to follow up_Elisa1

Rtech1: ^Rashad_Day 1_You can go to the library for more help

Rtech1.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_You can go to the library for more help

Rtech1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Well, either way, if she needs help she can always swing by the library!"
^Rashad?Smiling "She'll probably want to email the recruiters or add them on LinkedIn after the fair. I can help her set that up if she doesn't have an account yet."

s: ^Great, thanks Rashad!

Rtech2: ^Rashad_Day 1_Linkedin and email are great places to follow up_Elisa1

Rtech2.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Linkedin and email are great places to follow up_Elisa1

Rtech2: ^Rashad_Day 1_You can go to the library for more help

Rtech2.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_You can go to the library for more help

Rtech2: ^Rashad?Smiling "Alright! Well, she'll probably want to email the recruiters or add them on LinkedIn after the fair."
^Rashad?Smiling "And if she needs any help reaching out, be sure to let her know that she's welcome to swing by the library and ask me any questions."

s: ^Great, thanks Rashad!

segueOut.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Practice positive self-talk during the event_Elisa1

segueOut: ^Rashad_Day 1_It can get overwhelming with all the people in the auditorium

segueOut.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_It can get overwhelming with all the people in the auditorium

segueOut: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yeah, no problem!  Oh, and one other thing- confidence is huge for stuff like this."
^Rashad?Smiling "I know it gets overwhelming with all the folks in the auditorium and the long wait times, but tell your friend that she's got this."
^Rashad?Smiling "Plus, doing some positive self-talk before and during the event can help keep your spirits high."

s: ^What's positive self-talk?
^Got it, makes sense!

selfTalk: ^Rashad?Smiling "Self talk is like being your own cheerleader. Instead of thinking "oh my god, I'm not qualified, I don't belong here" and things like that, you gotta be your own wingman!"
^Rashad?Smiling "Tell her to focus on thoughts like "I'm ready," "I can do this," and "no matter what, it'll turn out ok.""
^Rashad?Smiling "If she keeps up her positive thinking, it'll go a long way in helping her present her best self at the career fair."

s: ^Wow, that's awesome!
^And that stuff works?

visualization: ^Rashad?Smiling "Oh, and tell her that for another confidence boost, she could try visualizing herself as one of her role models!"

s: ^Visualizing herself?
^Oh interesting!

vis2: ^Rashad_Day 1_Visualize your role models for a confidence boost during the event_Elisa1

vis2.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Visualize your role models for a confidence boost during the event_Elisa1

vis2: ^Rashad_Day 1_One person you can imagine is Billie Dee Williams

vis2.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_One person you can imagine is Billie Dee Williams

vis2: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yeah! If you picture a role model or a strong leader before an event, it'll help you feel more confident during it."
^Rashad?Smiling "When I get nervous, I always picture Billie Dee Williams. Or my uncle. He kind of looks like Billie Dee Williams, now that I think about it... "

s: ^I'll be sure to pass that along! Thanks Rashad!
^Sounds good! I'll go tell Elisa- thanks for all your help.

vis3: ^Rashad_Day 1_Visualize your role models for a confidence boost during the event_Elisa1

vis3.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Visualize your role models for a confidence boost during the event_Elisa1

vis3: ^Rashad_Day 1_One person to imagine is Billie Dee Williams

vis3.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_One person to imagine is Billie Dee Williams

vis3: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yeah, all she'd have to do is picture a role model or a strong leader before an event. It’ll help her feel a lot more confident afterwards."
^Rashad?Smiling "When I get nervous, I always picture Billie Dee Williams. Or my uncle. He kind of looks like Billie Dee Williams, now that I think about it..."

s: ^I'll be sure to pass that along! Thanks Rashad!
^Sounds good! I'll go tell Elisa- thanks for all your help.

selfTalk2: ^Rashad?Smiling "Absolutely! It's proven to up people's confidence. Oh, and tell her that for another confidence boost, she could try visualizing herself as one of her role models!"

s: ^Visualizing herself?
^Oh interesting!

REnd: ^Rashad?Smiling "No problem! Anyway, I'd better get back to work. Let me know if there's anything else!"

s: ^See ya!
